lead_paragraph: At a time when New Jersey public schools are cutting back, Saddle River Day School is scrambling for students.
snippet: At a time when New Jersey public schools are cutting back, Saddle River Day School is scrambling for students.

headline.main: A Private School’s Ads Imply Public School Slippage
headline.seo: In Ads, a Private School Implies Public School Slippage
headline.print_headline: Hint of Tough Times in a Private School’s Ads
